x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: The CDN URL Property for the Real Estate Dashboard and Real Estate Asset Management Applications are pointing to a Staging Server, instead of the Production Server, due to an Override Value contained in the Store Download used to install/upgrade the to the Sweden version of Nuvolo.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Incorrect Real Estate Properties
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: From the Real Estate Settings UI Page, revert real_estate_url to default.
